author: antoine
msg: Fix a bug with the action RMDIR of the FTP task
The RMDIR action was bound to fail if there was more than one level of directories to delete.
The problem has been reported by Sairam Manda on the user list on October 10th and 13th.

author: antoine
msg: Added a testcase for the ftp task concerning the deletion of directories
